Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to us at YETI. We value your interest in the Rambler 10oz Wine Tumbler. The 10/20oz Rambler Tumbler Lids are not compatible with the Rambler 10oz Wine Tumbler. We are constantly working to expand our product line. If youâ€™ve got an idea for a Wine Tumbler lid feel free to submit an idea submission!
Stay tuned about new products by signing up for notifications on YETI.com. Please let us know if you have any additional questions.
Sincerely,
